nodes.text: Raffaele Ienco is an artist who illustrated the 2020 comic series Star Wars: Darth Vader. He also illustrated the 6 issue mini-series Batman: Sins of the Father for DC Comics, Postal: Deliverance for Top Cow/Image Comics, created and illustrated Symmetry along with Matt Hawkins for Top Cow/Image Comics, wrote and illustrated Mechanism for Top Cow/Image Comics, Epic Kill, StairWay, Manifestations, Devoid of Life, also illustrated for Marvel-- Avengers World and Fantastic Four.
